name: Words that End in the Middle! Trivia Quiz | Words Within Words | 10 Questions

questions.text:
As all of the words have end in the middle, if it's a five letter word you will need to add one letter at each end. E.g: b(end)s.
Add two letters each end of end for a seven letter word ( _ _end_ _ ), and three letters each end for a nine letter word.

What word of seven letters with end in the middle means: 
Combined or mixed together.
questions.explanation:
Blended.

	Bl(end)ed.Often used to describe the act of combining constituent parts, as in: the cook blended the inredients in a bowl. Blended come from the Middle English word "blenden".

questions.text:
What word of nine letters with end in the middle means: 
Historically famous people or events.
questions.explanation:
Legendary.

	Leg(end)ary.Legend is from the Latin "legenda" meaning to be read, as in historical records of people or events.

questions.text:
What word of nine letters with end in the middle means:
Tables of days, months and years.
questions.explanation:
calendars.

	Cal(end)ars. Most of the Western world uses the Gregorian calendar which was introduced in 1582.

questions.text:
What word of nine letters with end in the middle means:
Moving up or climbing.
questions.explanation:
Ascending.

	Asc(end)ing.Ascending can also mean to a higher degree: ascending order of complexity.

questions.text:
What word of five letters with end in the middle means:
Provides cash or item temporally on agreement of future return.
questions.explanation:
lends.

	L(end)s.Lends can also mean suitable for as in: some politicians lend themselves to ridicule.

questions.text:
What word of nine letters with end in the middle means:
About to happen.
questions.explanation:
Impending.

	Imp(end)ing. Your score for this quiz is impending.

questions.text:
What word of seven letters with end in the middle means:
Thin and delicate.
questions.explanation:
Slender.

	Sl(end)er.Slender comes from the Middle English "sclendre". It can also mean meagre as in: slender chance of success.

questions.text:
What word of nine letters with end in the middle means:
Protecting and keeping safe from danger.
questions.explanation:
Defending.

	Def(end)ing.The word defending is often used to mean repelling an attack: defending their territory. It is also used in a sporting context: defending their goal.

questions.text:
What word of seven letters with end in the middle means:
Altered or changed.
questions.explanation:
Amended.

	Am(end)ed.Amended usually means changed for the sake of improvement: the rules were amended to make them easier to understand.

questions.text:
What word of Nine letters with end in the middle means:
Behavior causing displeasure.
questions.explanation:
Offending.

	Off(end)ing.The word means to insult, affront or outrage: his bad manners were offending the whole group.
